name: 陳怡靜
objective:
本課程是提供予港澳學生暨僑生修習之國文專門課程。若身分為僑生且通過本校國文科能力考試之水準者，即可修習。若為外籍生具備相當於 TOCFL C1 以上等級者，若欲選修，請向授課老師諮詢。
本課程內容主要以實用為目的之華語取向，從語言、文學、心理與文化等觀點，進一步帶入實務的課程任務，學生需具備高度的參與討論之熱忱及創意。
本學期將從幾個重要的議題探討，透過相關議題的文本，理解文化與思想的背後脈絡，俾使學生在這議題上建構合宜的關係與溝通。
This course is a specialized Chinese language course for students from Hong Kong, Macau and overseas Chinese. Those who are overseas Chinese students and have passed the level of the school's Chinese liberal arts proficiency test can take part in it. If you are a foreign student with a TOCFL C1 or higher level, please consult with your instructor if you want to take it.
The content of this course is mainly oriented towards practical Chinese. From the perspectives of language, literature, psychology and culture, it is further brought into practical course tasks. Students need to have a high degree of enthusiasm and creativity to participate in discussions.
